2026-02-13T12:37:54.4601358Z ##[group]Run # Copy Copilot session state files to logs folder for artifact collection
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4601970Z [36;1m# Copy Copilot session state files to logs folder for artifact collection[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4602505Z [36;1m# This ensures they are in /tmp/gh-aw/ where secret redaction can scan them[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4602950Z [36;1mSESSION_STATE_DIR="$HOME/.copilot/session-state"[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4603312Z [36;1mLOGS_DIR="/tmp/gh-aw/sandbox/agent/logs"[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4603592Z [36;1m[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4604142Z [36;1mif [ -d "$SESSION_STATE_DIR" ]; then[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4604577Z [36;1m  echo "Copying Copilot session state files from $SESSION_STATE_DIR to $LOGS_DIR"[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4605032Z [36;1m  mkdir -p "$LOGS_DIR"[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4605380Z [36;1m  cp -v "$SESSION_STATE_DIR"/*.jsonl "$LOGS_DIR/" 2>/dev/null || true[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4605799Z [36;1m  echo "Session state files copied successfully"[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4606102Z [36;1melse[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4606410Z [36;1m  echo "No session-state directory found at $SESSION_STATE_DIR"[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4606749Z [36;1mfi[0m
2026-02-13T12:37:54.4652000Z shell: /usr/bin/bash -e {0}

2026-02-13T12:37:54.4652432Z   DEFAULT_BRANCH: master
